author: Vasundhara Garg
title: Barack And Michelle Obama Are Surely Enjoying Their Post-Presidency Vacation (Video)
text:
IN Celebrities ON 02 Feb, 2017 Barack And Michelle Obama Are Surely Enjoying Their Post-Presidency Vacation (Video) Share on twitter Follow Us On 
Barack Obama has been etched in our memories so well that no Donald Trump can erase them. Obama has always charmed people the world over with his stature, conduct and etiquettes. There is no denying his always-gleaming face, that strikes when you think of the former POTUS. There is no remembering him, coz there is no forgetting him! 
While Donald Trump is busy giving out new legislations our very own Obama is seen enjoying his post-presidency vacation at the island of Anegada in the Caribbean, with the entrepreneur, Sir Richard Branson. 
Have a look at the pics. Barack And Michelle Obama Are Surely Enjoying Their Post-Presidency Vacation (Video) 754 396
